assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Dukhan Bank Q.P.S.C., an Islamic bank, provides various banking and financial products and services to private and corporate clients. It offers current, savings, and deposit accounts; debit, credit, and prepaid cards; personal, car, and home financing; salary advance; wealth management solutions; investment solutions, such as portfolio management services, mutual funds, capital protected products, and others; domestic and international payments and transfers, treasury and foreign exchange, and deposit products and short-term investments solutions; customized financing, residential and commercial properties mortgages, letters of credit, guarantees, short-term liquidity solutions, and global concierge lifestyle service; and other services to personal and private clients. The company also provides current and Mudarabah, and other accounts; contract finance services, including issuance of various bonds; domestic and international trade services, which include shipping guarantee indemnity, letter of guarantee application, Murhaba sale contract, and agency contract; trade finance, letters of credit (LC) and non-LC trade business, and guarantees; funded services through syndications and other debt instruments; credit and other bank cards; and other services to corporate clients. In addition, it offers network, phone, Internet, and mobile banking services; digital banking services; and other services. The company was formerly known as Barwa Bank Q.P.S.C. and changed its name to Dukhan Bank Q.P.S.C. in October 2020. Dukhan Bank Q.P.S.C. was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Doha, Qatar.
